title: U.S. states with state cyber bullying laws as of November 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Category Of Cyber Bullying Law in the x axis and State totals in the y axis.
The State totals is appeared to be the highest at Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy and lowest at Category Of Cyber Bullying Law Includes off-campus.
There is a difference of 32.0 between the maximum Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy and minimum Category Of Cyber Bullying Law Includes off-campus.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Category Of Cyber Bullying Law in the x axis and State totals in the y axis.
The maximum State totals 49.0 is found at Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy and the minimum is found at Includes off-campus where State totals is 17.0.
Category Of Cyber Bullying Law  has the second highest value for State totals.
The difference of State totals between the highest and lowest Category Of Cyber Bullying Law is 32.0.

Category Of Cyber Bullying Law School policy is higher than any other Category Of Cyber Bullying Laws with value 49.0, followed by , and School sanction for cyber bullying. Down to Category Of Cyber Bullying Law Includes off-campus with the lowest value 17.0.
The Category Of Cyber Bullying Law Includes off-campus tends to be 1.21 percent lower than average.
The State totals is 203.0 if we add up values of all Category Of Cyber Bullying Laws.

data.Category Of Cyber Bullying Law: Includes cyber bullying or online harassment
